title: EU car sales : share of diesel engines 2013 - 2017 , by brand
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of passenger car sales on the Y-axis for 18 different Brands for 2 groups 2013, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
For Brand Volvo, 2013 had the highest Share of passenger car sales 87.0 among the 2 groups and in Toyota, 2017 had the lowest Share of passenger car sales 8.0.
Brand Volvo and Toyota had the biggest gap of 61.0 between the highest and lowest Share of passenger car sales found for 2013.
Averaging all 2 groups 2013, and 2017, the Brand Volvo is the maximum Share of passenger car sales and Toyota is the minimum Share of passenger car sales.

Brand Volvo and Toyota had the biggest gap of 61.0 between the highest and lowest Share of passenger car sales found for 2013.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of passenger car sales on the Y-axis for 18 different Brands for 2 groups 2013, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest Share of passenger car sales for Brand Volvo and 2017 had the lowest Share of passenger car sales for Brand Toyota.
Among all the Brands, 2013 had the highest Share of passenger car sales 87.0 in Brand Volvo and lowest value 26.0 in Brand Toyota.
The maximum Share of passenger car sales for 2013 that was found in Brand Volvo was 3.35 times larger than the minimum Share of passenger car sales observed in Brand Toyota.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Share of passenger car sales was found in case of 2013.
Averaging all 2 groups 2013, and 2017, the Brand Volvo is the maximum Share of passenger car sales and Toyota is the minimum Share of passenger car sales.
